sandwiches.description: Try our crispy chicken sandwich made with seasoned chicken breast, processed white cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles, and smoky honey mustard sauce. Limited time only at participating restaurants.

A fan favourite gets some added zing. This sandwich features Canadian farm-raised chicken and pork, made with rotisserie-style chicken and Maplewood Smoked Bacon topped with crispy veggies and the zesty kick of our NEW Peppercorn Ranch dressing.

Try our crispy chicken sidekick made with seasoned chicken breast, lettuce, pickles, and smoky honey mustard sauce served warm and toasty on our potato bun. At participating restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.

Get a taste of Canada in your favourite Club sandwich. Featuring Deli-Style turkey and ham, Maplewood Smoked Bacon, made from Canadian farm-raised turkey and pork. Topped with lettuce and tomato, and a Smoky Honey Mustard sauce.

Get a taste of Canada with a tangy twist. Featuring our Maplewood Smoked Bacon and Deli-Style Ham, made with Canadian farm-raised pork, all covered in Canadian Cheddar Cheese, with Smoky Honey Mustard and mayonnaise.

A crispy addition to a Subway® favourite. The Crispy Chicken Bacon & Peppercorn Ranch sandwich features crispy seasoned chicken breast, Maplewood Smoked Bacon, delicious shredded monterey jack cheese topped with fresh veggies and the zesty kick of our NEW Peppercorn Ranch dressing.
We’ve taken our Canadian farm-raised Deli-Style turkey topped with mayonnaise and given it a flavour boost by adding our smooth NEW Smashed Avocado to the mix of delicious crisp greens.
Get a taste of Tex-Mex. Featuring Canadian seasoned Steak and our NEW Smashed Avocado, topped with our classic Chipotle sauce and given an extra kick with our sweet and tangy Banana Peppers.

A classic that never goes out of style. Made with pork raised on Canadian farms, our deli-style Black Forest ham has never been better. Load it up with all your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant, on your choice of freshly baked bread. Yum!
Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love our Cold Cut Combo! One bite into these delicious deli meats, topped with crisp vegetables and served on your choice of bread and you'll be addicted.

Looking for a taste of heaven? Try our NEW Green Goddess Chicken, made with Canadian farm-raised Rotisserie-Style Chicken and topped with our NEW Smashed Avocado and the cool, refreshing blend of herbs in our NEW Green Goddess Dressing.
Embrace a new take on a Subway® staple. Your favourite crisp veggies and NEW Smashed Avocado, drizzled in our NEW Green Goddess Dressing with a bright and fresh blend of herbs.
Our Egg & Bacon sandwich will leave you wanting seconds. Made with Canadian eggs, tasty Maplewood smoked bacon made from pork raised on Canadian farms and processed white cheddar.
Once you try our Egg & Cheese sandwich, you’ll never look back. Made with Canadian eggs, and processed white cheddar. So good.

Sweet and savoury is an undefeated combination. Made with pork raised on Canadian farms, our deli-style Black Forest ham, processed white cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, red onion, pickles and our smoky honey mustard served warm and toasty on a potato bun. At participating Restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.

Pepperoni and genoa salami, white processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomato and both our garlic aioli and house sandwich sauce served warm and toasty on our potato bun.At participating restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.
You’ll love every bite of our Egg & Ham sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms, and processed white cheddar. Simply delicious.
Power through any day with our Egg & Sausage sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, sausage, and processed white cheddar cheese.
Who doesn't love grilled chicken? Made with mouth-watering Canadian farm-raised chicken and topped with your favourite veggie freshly sliced in restaurant, all on our freshly baked bread.

There's a trip to Italy in every bite. This all-time Italian classic is packed with Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, and deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms. Get it topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant on your choice of freshly baked bread, and you'll be saying "grazie!"

You had me at ranch. Try the Savoury Turkey Ranch, made with deli-style turkey raised on Canadian farms, processed white cheddar cheese, spinach, tomato and peppercorn ranch sauce served warm and toasty on a potato bun. At participating Restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.
Zesty meatballs covered with marinara sauce, and served on your choice of bread. Every bite is simply sensational! Get it toasted for even more great taste. Meatball Marinara not available in QC.
The Italian sandwich par excellence. Topped with marinara sauce, cheese and pepperoni. Try it toasted for even more pizza taste!
Sweet meets smoky in our NEW Stampede BBQ Grilled Chicken with Canadian farm-raised Chicken made with seasoned white meat, blanketed in melted Canadian Cheddar Cheese and a Sweet & Smoky BBQ Sauce.
Hot, tender, shaved steak, served on the bread of your choice. It's just bursting with flavour! Toast your bread to add even more great taste!
Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki is stuffed with teriyaki glazed chicken strips and topped with our own fat free Sweet Onion sauce.
You’ll love every bite of our classic tuna sandwich. 100% wild caught tuna blended with creamy mayonnaise then topped with your choice of crisp, fresh veggies. 100% delicious.

A powerful trifecta of taste! With the Turkey, Bacon & Avocado sandwich, every bite is full of flavour. Made with Canadian farm-raised deli-style turkey, smashed avocado, and Maplewood smoked bacon made with Canadian farm-raised pork, and topped with your favourite veggies and sauces.

Simple, yet always bursting with flavour. Dive into our deli-style turkey breast sandwich made with turkey raised on Canadian farms and topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant!
Our veggie patty is vegan and free of artificial colours and flavours. Topped with lettuce, spinach, onions, peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers and your favourite sauce!

Crispy, crunchy and classically delicious. The Veggie Delite® is proof that a veggie sandwich can be high in flavour. Try a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, cucumbers and onions. Customize it with your choice of condiments on the bread of your choice.

salads.description: Embrace a new take on a Subway® staple. Your favourite crisp veggies and NEW Smashed Avocado, drizzled in our NEW Green Goddess Dressing with a bright and fresh blend of herbs.
Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

breakfasts.description: Once you try our Egg & Cheese Sidekick, you’ll never look back. Made with Canadian eggs, processed white cheddar and toasted on our potato bun. So good. At participating restaurants. Plus tax.

Taste the joy of breakfast at any time of the day. Made with Canadian eggs, deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms, processed white cheddar, and your choice of veggies freshly sliced in store. Simply delicious. At participating Restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.
Our Egg & Bacon Sidekick will leave you wanting seconds. Made with Canadian eggs, tasty bacon, and processed white cheddar toasted on our potato bun. At participating restaurants. Plus tax.
You’ll love every bite of our Egg & Ham sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms, and processed white cheddar. Simply delicious.
Power through any day with our Egg & Sausage sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, sausage, and processed white cheddar cheese.
Once you try our Egg & Cheese sandwich, you’ll never look back. Made with Canadian eggs, and processed white cheddar. So good.
Our Egg & Bacon sandwich will leave you wanting seconds. Made with Canadian eggs, tasty Maplewood smoked bacon made from pork raised on Canadian farms and processed white cheddar.
Our Egg & Bacon English Muffin Sandwich will leave you wanting seconds. Made with Canadian eggs, tasty bacon, and processed white cheddar toasted on an English Muffin just the way you like it.
Once you try our Egg & Cheese English Muffin Sandwich, you’ll never look back. Made with Canadian eggs, processed white cheddar on a toasted English muffin. So good.

Taste the joy of breakfast at any time of the day. A tasty English muffin, made with Canadian eggs, deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms, processed white cheddar, and your choice of veggies freshly sliced in store. Simply delicious. At participating Restaurants. Extras/Add-ons addt'l. Plus tax.
